roleset.name: make happy, fulfilled, fullfillment of a requirement
roleset.note: SATISFY-V NOTES: Frames file for 'satisfy' based on sentences in financial subcorpusand automatic expansion via verbnet.Member of Vncls amuse-31.1. (from satisfy.01-v)
SATISFACTION-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on internet examples. No corresponding VNcls. (from satisfaction.02-n)
SATISFIED-J NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from satisfied.01-j)

roles.note: Arg0-agent not expected to occur. (from satisfaction.01-n)

example.name: satisfy-v: instrumental subject
example.text: U.S. Banknote said it believes the sale, if completed, apparently would satisfy antitrust issues raised by the U.S. Justice Department about U.S. Banknote's offer to buy International Banknote.
example.arg: antitrust issues raised by the U.S. Justice Department about U.S. Banknote's offer to buy International Banknote

example.name: satisfy-v: passive
example.text: ``We weren't satisfied until they became sell programs,'' says Mr. DaPuzzo, who now thinks it adds unnecessary volatility.

example.name: satisfy-v: all args
example.text: John satisfied all Mary's concerns about his maturity with his tantrum.
example.arg: all Mary's concerns about his maturity

example.name: satisfaction-n: args 0, 1
example.text: Leaders from both sides participating in the negotiations expressed their satisfaction over the outcome of the talks
example.arg: over the outcome of the talks

example.name: satisfaction-n: args 0 and 1
example.text: Where the title to stock pledged to secure a disputed debt was not divested, and the owner's right to possession depended on his satisfaction of the debt, ...

example.name: satisfaction-n: with arg2
example.text: satisfaction of the requirement by testing on the subjects covered in the program
example.arg: by testing on the subjects covered in the program

roleset.name: convince
roleset.note: SATISFY-V NOTES: Adjectival 'satisfied' based on BOLT-6. No Vncls. (from satisfy.02-v)

example.name: satisfy-v: and reciprocal too
example.text: However, in light of the risks involved in such transactions, banks should satisfy themselves that they have the skills to participate in this market and clear policy guidelines on acceptable levels of exposure to such transactions, he said.
example.arg: in light of the risks involved in such transactions
that they have the skills to participate in this market and clear policy guidelines on acceptable levels of exposure to such transactions

example.name: satisfied-j
example.text: But the traffic police did not do measurements , and made determinations just by naked eye , so I was not very satisfied .

roleset.name: meeting the acceptable standard
roleset.note: SATISFACTORY-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on medi-tmprl1to8. (from satisfactory.01-j)

example.name: satisfactory-j: arg1
example.text: Reports : Laboratory tests are reviewed and are satisfactory .
